Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Veroru Thoodhan Migundha Adhigaaramudaiyavanaai, Vaanaththilirundhu Irangivarakkanden; Ivanudaiya Magimaiyinaal Boomi Piragaasamaayitru.

2 avan Balaththa Saththamittu: Magaa Baabilon Vizhundhadhu! Vizhundhadhu! Adhu Peygaludaiya Kudiyiruppum, Asuththa Aavigaludaiya Kaavalveedum, Asuththamum Aruvaruppumulla Sagalavidha Paravaigaludaiya Koodumaayitru.

3 avaludaiya Vesiththanaththin Ukkiramaana Madhuvai Ellaa Jaadhigalum Kudiththaargal; Boomiyin Raajaakkal Avalode Vesiththanampanninaargal; Boomiyin Varththagar Avaludaiya Selvachcherukkin Migudhiyinaal Aisuvariyavaangalaanaargal Endru Vilambinaan.

4 pinbu, Veroru Saththam Vaanaththilirundhu Undaagak Ketten. Adhu: En Janangale, Neengal Avaludaiya Paavangalukku Udanpadaamalum, Avalukku Neritum Vaadhaigalil Agappadaamalum Irukkumpadikku Avalaivittu Veliye Vaarungal.
5 avaludaiya Paavam Vaanapariyandham Ettinadhu, Avaludaiya Aniyaayangalai Dhevan Ninaivukoorndhaar.

6 aval Ungalukkup Balanaliththadhupola Neengalum Avalukkup Balanaliyungal; Avaludaiya Kiriyaigalukkuththakkadhaaga Avalukku Rattippaagak Koduththuth Theerungal; Aval Ungalukkuk Kalandhukoduththa Paaththiraththile Rattippaaga Avalukkuk Kalandhukodungal.

7 aval Thannai Magimaippaduththi, Selvachcherukkaai Vaazhndhadhevvalavo Avvalavaai Vaadhaiyaiyum Thukkaththaiyum Avalukkuk Kodungal. Naan Raajasthireeyaai Veetrirukkiren; Naan Kaimpennalla, Naan Thukkaththaik Kaanpadhillaiyendru Aval Than Irudhayaththile Enninaal.

8 aagaiyaal Avalukku Varum Vaadhaigalaagiya Saavum Thukkamum Panjamum Ore Naalile Varum; Aval Akkiniyinaale Sutterikkappaduvaal; Avalukku Niyaayaththeerppuk Kodukkum Dhevanaagiya Karththarvallamaiyullavar.
9 avaludane Vesiththananjeydhu Selvachcherukkaai Vaazhndha Boomiyin Raajaakkalum Aval Vegiradhinaal Undaana Pugaiyaik Kaanumpodhu Avalukkaaga Azhudhu Pulambi,
10 avalukku Undaana Vaadhaiyinaal Bayandhu, Dhooraththile Nindru: Aiyaiyo! Baabilon, Magaanagarame! Balamaana Pattaname! Ore Naazhigaiyil Unakku Aakkinai Vandhadhe! Enbaargal.

11 boomiyin Varththagargalum Thangal Thangal Sarakkugalaagiya Ponnaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Raththinangalaiyum, Muththukkalaiyum, Sallaavaiyum, Raththaamparaththaiyum, Pattaadaigalaiyum, Sivappaadaigalaiyum,

12 sagalavidha Vaasanaik Kattaigalaiyum, Thandhaththinaal Seydhirukkira Sagalavidha Vasthukkalaiyum, Vilaiyuyarndha Maraththinaalum Venkalaththinaalum Irumbinaalum Vellaik Kallinaalum Seydhirukkira Sagalavidha Vasthukkalaiyum,

13 ilavangappattaiyaiyum, Thoobavarkkangalaiyum, Thailangalaiyum, Saambiraaniyaiyum, Thiraatcharasaththaiyum, Enneyaiyum, Melliya Maavaiyum Kodhumaiyaiyum, Maadugalaiyum, Aadugalaiyum, Kudhiraigalaiyum, Radhangalaiyum, Adimaigalaiyum, Manusharudaiya Aaththumaakkalaiyum Inik Kolvaarillaadhapadiyaal, Avalukkaaga Azhudhu Pulambuvaargal.
14 un Aaththumaa Ichchiththa Pazhavarkkangal Unnaivittu Neengippoyina; Kozhumaiyaanavaigalum Sampiramamaanavaigalum Unnaivittu Neengippoyina; Nee Avaigalai Inik Kaanbadhillai.
15 ippadippattavaigalaik Kondu Varththagampanni Avalaal Aisuvariyavaangalaanavargal Avalukku Undaana Vaadhaiyinaal Bayandhu, Dhooraththile Nindru;

16 aiyaiyo! Sallaavum Raththaamparamum Sivappaadaiyum Thariththu, Ponninaalum Raththinangalinaalum Muththukkalinaalum Singaarikkappattirundha Magaa Nagarame! Oru Naazhigaiyile Ivvalavu Aisuvariyamum Azhindhupoyitre! Endru Solli, Azhudhu Thukkippaargal.
17 maalumigal Yaavarum, Kappalgalil Yaaththirai Pannugiravargal Yaavarum, Kappalaatgalum, Samuththiraththile Thozhilseygira Yaavarum Thooraththile Nindru,
18 aval Vegiradhinaal Undaana Pugaiyaip Paarththu: Indha Magaa Nagaraththirkoppaana Nagaram Undo Endru Saththamittu,

19 thangal Thalaigalmel Puzhudhiyaippottukkondu: Aiyaiyo, Magaa Nagarame! Samuththiraththile Kappalgalaiyudaiya Anaivarum Ivaludaiya Uchchidhamaana Sambooranaththinaal Aisuvariyavaangalaanaargale! Oru Naazhigaiyil Ival Paazhaaipponaale! Endru Azhudhu Thukkiththu Olamiduvaargal.
20 paralogame! Parisuththavaangalaagiya Apposthalargale! Theerkkadharisigale! Avalaikkuriththuk Kalikoorungal. Ungal Nimiththam Dhevan Avalai Niyaayandheerththaare! Endru Thoodhan Sonnaan.

21 appozhudhu, Balamulla Thoodhanoruvan Periya Endhirakkallaiyoththa Oru Kallai Eduththuch Samuththiraththile Erindhu: Ippadiye Baabilon Magaanagaram Vekamaaith Thallundu, Ini Orupodhum Kaanappadaamarpogum.

22 suramandalakkaararum, Keedhavaaththiyakkaararum. Naagasurakkaararum, Ekkaalakkaararumaanavargaludaiya Saththam Ini Unnidaththil Ketkappaduvadhumillai; Endhath Thozhilaaliyum Ini Unnidaththil Kaanappaduvadhumillai; Endhirasaththam Ini Unnidaththil Ketkappaduvadhumillai.

23 vilakkuvelichcham Ini Unnidaththil Piragaasippadhumillai; Manavaalanum Manavaattiyumaanavargaludaiya Saththam Ini Unnidaththil Ketkappaduvadhumillai. Un Varththagar Boomiyil Periyorgalaayirundhaargale; Un Sooniyaththaal Ellaa Jaadhigalum Mosamponaargale.
24 theerkkadharisigaludaiya Iraththamum Parisuththavaangaludaiya Iraththamum Boomiyil Kollappatta Anaivarudaiya Iraththamum Avalidaththil Kaanappattadhu Endru Vilambinaan.
